definition: A device or object that is typically attached to another object, often used for transportation or support purposes. It is commonly used to carry or tow additional items, such as luggage, trailers, or other vehicles.

examples.german: Ich bin ein großer Anhänger von Fußball.
examples.english: I am a big fan of football.

examples.german: Sie trägt einen Anhänger um den Hals.
examples.english: She is wearing a pendant around her neck.

examples.german: Der Anhänger des Films war sehr enttäuschend.
examples.english: The trailer of the movie was very disappointing.

examples.german: Er ist ein Anhänger der Umweltschutzbewegung.
examples.english: He is a supporter of the environmental movement.

examples.german: Der Anhänger des Autos war voll beladen.
examples.english: The trailer of the car was fully loaded.
